name: Marketpress Total Sales
author: Anil Nagda

sections.description:
You may want to show off your site’s total sales on the front-end of your site. This plugin adds a new shortcode [MPTS], that will do just that! it also supports multisite.

Example Use:

Show off your site’s total sales

You want to brag to your customers how much money you’re making

You want to brag to your customers how much money you’re making from each site in case of multisite.

The Shortcode: [MPTS]
sections.installation:
1. Either download the plugin and upload it or search for it under Plugins > Add New. Activate it, too.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the [MPTS] shortcode in post or pages
  4. Place <?php do_shortcode('[MPTS]'); ?> in your templates
  5. Be awesome!
